website_summaries.verdict: Good upgrade for young riders with some experience, but not ideal as a "first" motorbike. The 80cc gas engine delivers enough power for casual rides on flat terrain.
pros: 80cc gas engine offers a longer range than electric
Throttle has governor for young riders
cons: Motor has several quality control issues, including poor starting

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For Off Pavement
customer_reviews.text: We were debating over an electric scooter or the monster Moto minibike for our 10yr old daughter whom weighs only 75lbs... we opted for the monster Moto minibike because of the gas engine and specs said would go 23mph and thought it would be great to ride around our farm. We were wrong—- this minibike barely has enough power to go on flat pavement. If you plan on riding off pavement I would not recommend. Very disappointed and wish I had read other similar reviews noting its lack of power before purchasing. We returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten D.

customer_reviews.title: Might take some extra work
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed it went for a ride for a few minutes then the motor stalled repeatedly and now it won’t continue to run without stopping. I grease the clutch And now it works as expected Watch the YouTube video for greasing the clutch
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Bike has no power and no service support !
customer_reviews.text: Bike will not support a 110lb. Female. Motor runs all is adjusted correct but lacks the power to move a 110 lb. Female rider. Mega Moto will not return any of my emails and when I call the 800 number the receptionist says I must contact support via the internet. I have and got no reply. Zero help at all and now my window of opportunity to return bike has gone by several days. How convenient.
customer_reviews.author: jack_ knife

customer_reviews.title: although perfect for my son who is 13
customer_reviews.text: although perfect for my son who is 13, the clutch keeps stalling the bike due to engagement when coming to a stop; it does the job but that should be improved; overall nice starting machine
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners, but way fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and fast. Not a great choice for kids learning about ride ons for the first time, but once they are used to them this ride will spoil them silly. Easy to set up. Truly a fun ride with just the right amount of power.
customer_reviews.author: JFS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mini Bike.  Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This Mini Bike is pretty cool. Got it for my 6 year old daughter. She's already mastered her scooter and bycicle and is ready for the next step. It showed up in just days via UPS. Looks great, fired right up, came with oil and doesnt have a scratch on it. I screwed in the throttle screw and we did some start stop drills till she could do it without thinking then she was off. Kids need to wear full riding gear while on these. I plan to buy one for my youngest son when he's ready and have two 200s in route for my two 13 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael a shatto

customer_reviews.title: It's shockingly a very comfortable ride. I ride this bike all over
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 45yr old tom-boy and I bought this for myself. (I'm 180lbs 5'5) I am not cramped up on it at all. It's shockingly a very comfortable ride. I ride this bike all over. And it has no problem moving me. I even ride my 2yr old grandson with me. This IS NOT A TOY!!!!!!!! I still can't believe the performance for the price! Love my new toy! Not a single complaint except I wish the weather would break so I could ride it more! It's light enough that I can pick it up and throw it in the back of the Tahoe (or a large trunk) and take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Centrifugal Clutch bad after a few rides??
customer_reviews.text: My son rode it a couple days since Christmas. Now when riding or while it just sits there warming up it will make a strange noise and kills the engine. When it’s sitting there and it does it the mini bike launches forward. I am assuming it’s the centrifugal clutch. Anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Everything was perfect with that one
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the first delivery. Muddy Girl would not crank. Their customer service was extremely responsive and sent out a new bike. Everything was perfect with that one. Thank you Monster Moto for your great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: broken front fender out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my grandson for Christmas. My son put it together yesterday so it was ready for the big day. found that the front fender is broken. I hope the seller sees this and send me a new fender to replace the one that came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: jpa

customer_reviews.title: Mike's run great only problem I have had I can not get ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike run great only problem I have had I can not get gas caps to stop leaking fuel out of them
customer_reviews.author: howard crowder

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: excellent for price and size for my son. Quick delivery and easy instructions and set up
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: 5 star, A+++ Great,
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for my grandson, He loves it, A++++ for anyone under 140 lbs,, still fun if you weigh more!
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it. The tires are wide enough to give ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. The tires are wide enough to give it some stability and it is loved and I mean loved by the 6 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, starts very easy. Purchased for our grand daughter, she has rode it a couple times now and enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: floyd peek

customer_reviews.title: Boys love them
customer_reviews.text: Own 2 both boys 5 & 9 love them. Will need to spray wd40 on clutch every few days to keep it from taking off after start
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!! You'll be happy you did!!
customer_reviews.text: This mini bike is so worth the money and a must for any family that loves to have fun! From me to my husband and our son we all have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken start string coil
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile product, the start string broke in the second day of use it !! My daughter is so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk. Bought it for my sons birthday. He rode it once and the pull rope messes up. Do not buy this or anything else from this seller. I can work on small engines and it is just a bad design the rope will not spool back on the sprocket at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dees

customer_reviews.title: Built in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I think they used to be made in China. Mine was built in the USA though and you can tell. My son and I both ride together up hills and all and it does just fine with 250 pounds on it So yeah its pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The mini is a must have for kids, it was delivered quickly and assembly was simple. Very satisfied with the product and the service ,i recommend this highly to anyone wanting one for an adult or child..
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Powers

customer_reviews.title: ... kids for Christmas (2015) and both are still running great with no problems (June 2016)
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the kids for Christmas (2015) and both are still running great with no problems (June 2016). Kids are 8 and 9 and about 42 inches tall and they fit perfect just had to turn screw in all the way till the got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with bike. Barely driven and stalls out constantly.
customer_reviews.author: nicole saylor

customer_reviews.title: It arrived not working on Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say my daughter received this and was very excited until we started it. As soon as we started it the cycle would want to start to take off. The clutch isn't adjusted right. Disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Steve Turko Jr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a month before we started having issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Came in open box, starter cord came off spindle, clutch makes noise, lurches forward then dies. The company won’t answer their phone. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The parts may be defective
customer_reviews.text: Pull string was defective right out the box. Hasn't been used since I bought it and no way to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very simple to operate - only needs oil and gas to start (oil is included). My boys love them, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ERC

customer_reviews.title: ... kids for Christmas (2015) and both are still running great with no problems (June 2016)
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the kids for Christmas (2015) and both are still running great with no problems (June 2016). Kids are 8 and 9 and about 42 inches tall and they fit perfect just had to turn screw in all the way till the got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old daughter loves her bike! It’s perfect size and speed for her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clutch is faulty
customer_reviews.text: Clutch has issues out of the box. Not pleased with poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best 450 Dollars Ever Spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could goof off on and so I could see what I could do with the engine. For all of the people who say it's slow, that's a lie! I weigh about 110 and I am about 5' 6" and it is FAST! Took it to the school parking lot after school hours and drove it around there, so much fun! Would definitely recommend to someone about my size or a bit smaller. Can't wait to have more fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Doyle

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It met all of my expectations. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these bikes both Run great only trouble I have had is gas caps leak ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bikes both Run great only trouble I have had is gas caps leak fuel all the time out the weep hole I can't get them to stop leaking keep Rags around the cap to keep from leaking did have trouble with throttle sticking at first I kept keeping oil put on them start working okay then
customer_reviews.author: howard crowder

customer_reviews.title: Does not make a lot noise. Now I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not make a lot noise. Now I can go with my son for 2 hour long walk. Electric scooter run out of power in just 4-5 mile.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY G

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the price! My 11year old can't wait to get home from school to ride. Make sure you have a nice big yard
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: the bike runs good.
customer_reviews.text: Starter cord malfunctioned on first pull. Contacted supplier and they sent a replacement cord assembly. Otherwise, the bike runs good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Lube and adjust chain!!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. Just make sure you lube all moving parts and adjust the chain before and after riding a few times. Chain kept popping off. Also had to flip upside down after filling with oil so it would cover internal engine parts. Before riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike came before it was due for delivery. It was packed very well to protect it from damage during shipping. The bike was extremely easy to assemble having only to bolt on the handlebars. Checked the oil, added gasoline, and three pulls later my 8 year old grandson was having the time of his life. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gaylor

customer_reviews.title: Not  a good buy on Momster Moto MM-B 80 Mini Bike
customer_reviews.text: had trouble getting it to crank had to take it to shop and pay $50 to mechanic and now it has a hole in the fuel line where gas dripped out over a three day period. Very disappointed in the product . Lynn Jordan
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome.... Showed up early and came with tools and oil needed to get it up and going. Just as it said .... Simply put on the handle bars and add gas (& oil) and away you go. Started on the second pull. I'm 6' 190 lbs and it even pulled me around. The kids love it and I even have my fair share of fun on it to.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome, well made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Anyone looking for a mini bike .. Look no further . This is it! It's awesome , well made in the USA. Shipped in crate and well received. This is the one! Thanks monster Moto!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fast deluvery easy to asemble and started on two pulls.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike for my Son
customer_reviews.text: Monstor moto, Nice bike for my Son.. He loves it rides it. And it goes long on a full tank... Great beginner bike for starters.
customer_reviews.author: RCArends

customer_reviews.title: awsome  Mini Bike
customer_reviews.text: I was Happy when i recvied it and the handle bars were easy to mount i would recomend the monster moto MM-B80 to all my friends and i would recomend it to who ever
customer_reviews.author: DalePopiel

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for Smaller Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great bike that the grandkids absolutely loved until they got a little bigger. We live on a somewhat hilly farm and the bikes are way underpowered to climb even the smaller hills. Our grandsons are 9 years old at 94 lbs and about 7 years old at 75 lbs. I have two of the bikes that are not ridden like they were when they were first purchased. A little more powerful motor would be a great improvement for continued use and enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gaylor

customer_reviews.title: but my ten and 9 year old nephews love them. I can see upgrading the engines pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: It needs a little more power, but my ten and 9 year old nephews love them. I can see upgrading the engines pretty soon, but a great starting point for any 7 - 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA junk
customer_reviews.text: NOT MADE IN THE USA!!!! I read reviews saying it was made in the U.S.A. and upon arrival it states in large print on the box "Made in China". Showed up without a manual, called customer service and they refused to send me a manual that was supposed to be included. I assembled the bike (very easy) and fueled it up... Will NOT start. Pulled it 50+ times and not even a sputter. I call customer service and they told me to take apart the carburetor and clean it. Typical Chinese crap. I paid the extra $ believing it was American made but nope. I'm going to try and return it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great bike you can't really get in to much trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike you can't really get in to much trouble with it and it has a governor for the speed.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: So this was supposed to be out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: So this was supposed to be out of the box and ready to ride. We bought I about 6 weeks ago and put it up for Christmas. My husband has been working on it for over an hour and still can't get it to start with my son anxiously standing at his side
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Fun even for the adults
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of fun n still seemed to go 25+ mph w us 200 pounders on it
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: 9 and 7 year old boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it! My 9 year old was too big for his electric motorcycle and this one is perfect. He is a tall kid and this is a great size for him. His 7 year old brother rides it a well. He wrecked it on concrete and the bike handled it fine. We will be buying a second one soon
customer_reviews.author: wulfcity

customer_reviews.title: Broke the second day, took it to a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke the second day, took it to a small engine repair shop and they couldn't do nothing with it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: ... in and start all is done but wont start nice christmas gift for 450
customer_reviews.text: just got this for my boy for christmas all you are supposed to do is put handlebars on gas in and start all is done but wont start nice christmas gift for 450 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Corey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more disappointed! This was a Christmas gift for my OVERLY excited 12 year old. He rode it a total of, maybe, 8 times on Christmas Day. On his last ride, most of our extended family were assembled, including cousins, uncles, etc. (and most of whom were a tad bit jealous) and as he rode off, the chain broke. Not just slipped-BROKE. How something like this happens on a brand new product mystifies me. Now we're left with spending money to try to fix something that should not have broken on something so new.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaM

product_meta.title: Mega Moto MM-B80-MG 2.5HP Without Suspension 80CC Youth Mini Bike (Muddy Girl Pink)
product_meta.description: Make next weekend epic with our affordable and popular Classic Mini Bike. It’s just like the ones we used to have in the good old days, only safer and easier to ride. This bike comes with a 80CC/2. 5HP engine that has a maximum speed of 23 mph. A 79. 5CC OHV engine powers the MM-B80, while the centrifugal clutch ensures easy operation. Monster Moto warrants the original retail purchaser of this product that it is free from defects in material and/or workmanship for a period of ninety (90) days from the date of purchase. Monster Moto builds every bike and go-kart to the highest quality standards. Our bikes are bigger, stronger, safer, and faster for the ultimate experience. Monster Moto is proud to launch the NEW Mega Moto line of products in Q4 2018. As part of our brand evolution, we are launching a new line of products built in the same tradition of Monster Moto products. Kids can explore the outdoors with confidence on Monster Moto and Mega Moto vehicles.
feature_bullets: EASY & SMOOTH - The powerful 80CC overhead valve engine and automatic clutch ensure easy operation and the large comfortable seat, spring-loaded foot pegs, motorcycle style throttle, and super grip tires provide a smooth and controlled ride even on the most rugged terrain.
SIMPLE TO SET UP - Comes pre-assembled and includes a tool kit. Simply attach the adjustable handlebars, check for proper oil level, add gas and go!
DURABLE - Durably constructed with a reinforced welded tube steel frame and polypropylene no-dent fenders providing the toughness you need to conquer the outdoors.

SAFETY FIRST - With a chain guard, exhaust heat shield and engine stop switch, this mini bike was built with safety in mind. The hand operated cable actuated rear disc brake allows for safe and reliable braking.

DECALS - Please note that with our recent brand change, you may receive a unit that has Monster Moto decals and packaging. Not to worry! Whether “Mega” or “Monster”, it’s the exact same great Moto product!

specifications.Cover Included: * Mega Moto Muddy Girl® Mini Bike * Tool kit and all hardware required to complete the assembly of the unit * Owner's manual * Certificate of origin * Oil
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars114 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
